attributes.action: ABOLISH THE MONARCHY ON THE RETIREMENT OF THE QUEEN
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Queen has announced she will retire in 5 years time. She has given the country a first class service. This should be a positive end to an outmoded form of headship of the state. A president with no extended family for the state to support, and with only one official residence is preferred once the Queen leaves office. Preparations should begin now.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
